title: pessat kcet
content: I'm writing pessat but can't write kcet because I'm not eligible for it, is it harder to get a seat through pessat?

comments.body: Pessat is easier and this year they're doubling the number of seats for cse so it should be a cakewalk
any sources for the doubling seats? I'm having second doubts just from the crowd size ðŸ’€
Is it really true that more cse seats are getting added?
its gonna be overcroded af, source is pretty much college website

They won't be doubling this year, originally they were going to shift all EC campus seats to RR and stop BTech in EC but I guess GJB construction progress is slower than they expected so it's postponed(you can check intake of courses on [pes.edu](https://pes.edu) it is back to 720 now).
Crowd zyada hai, ik ppl from pes
